channel.title: Help Running Client
channel.description:
Hi My name is nestor and i have a problem. I host a Server (508) and it works perfectly client server everything.
Now i want to start hosting a 474 & lower but i have a problem. i can ruen the server have it online & log in but if i take 2 steps boom client crashes & gives me this error. [img]http://i29.tinypic.com/t5lksj.jpg[/img]
please anyone help me if u can help em fix this ill send u 58$ i send by paypal.
Thank you.
